snippet: People close to Hillary Rodham Clinton are brushing off the oft-repeated assumption in the news media that a few paid speeches she is scheduled to deliver are indications that she will wait until at least the spring to announce her presidential...
abstract: People close to Hillary Rodham Clinton are brushing off the oft-repeated assumption in the news media that a few paid speeches she is scheduled to deliver are indications that she will wait until at least the spring to announce her presidential intentions.
lead_paragraph: Hillary Rodham Clinton’s timeline to declare whether she will run for president rests on many factors. Keeping her commitment to the New Jersey chapter of the American Camp Association is probably not one of them.

headline.main: Insiders Say Clinton’s Speeches Are No Hint to Her ’16 Timeline
